alert.note: Alert for Crook County Plains; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 01 at 2:12AM MDT until November 02 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR ALL OF NORTHEAST WYOMING AND WESTERN SOUTH DAKOTA... .Increasing southwest winds ahead of a developing low pressure system, coupled with very dry air and warm temperatures, will support a long duration of critical fire weather conditions over northeast WY and western SD this afternoon into Wednesday. Gusty southwest winds will develop this afternoon and will persist into Wednesday. The strongest winds are expected over northeast WY into far western SD, where gusts over 50 mph will be possible, especially Wednesday. Daytime RHâ€™s will fall into the teens both days. Poor RH recovery tonight will support continued elevated to critical fire weather conditions, especially on the eastern slopes of the Black Hills. A cold front will then move into the region Wednesday evening, with winds shifting northwest and RH`s increasing. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 9 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 316, AND 317... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 314 Northern Campbell, 315 Southern Campbell, 316 Crook County Plains and 317 Weston County Plains. * WINDS...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity will produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Crook County Plains; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains
